constructor-arg.value: select m.name,m.english_name,m.year,m.description,m.rating,m.id from movie m where m.id=?;
select c.name from country c,ref_movie_country rmc where c.id=rmc.id_country and rmc.id_movie=?;
select g.name from genre g,ref_movie_genre rmg where g.id=rmg.id_genre and rmg.id_movie=?;
SELECT description FROM (select r.description from review r where r.id_movie=?) T LIMIT 2;
